channel.title: Need help with 508/525 HD client
channel.description:
need help with josh's HD 508 client IP CHANGER. whenever i open it i type in 0.0.0.0 on the server ip bar and when i try loading it the client gets stuck in the "connecting to update server" i followed the tut on how to work the HD client but nothing is happening
plz help

item.title: Need help with 508/525 HD client
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

download .titana_cach_32 and put it an c: drive

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508/525 HD client
item.dc:creator: @_K8 _K8_
item.description:
@_K8 wrote:

switch to 127.0.0.1 and make sure you start the server first. but with that client i belive you need to edit your server to read and send back acctual “HD” information.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508/525 HD client
item.dc:creator: @judgechaos judgechaos
item.description:
@judgechaos wrote:

i got a cache525 and i installed it and put it inside My driver/WINDOWS/.titana_cache_32 but the HD loader client stays white…should i change to cache508???

i got the client to work but now i cant get into the game…it just says error connecting at login screen…can any1 give me a 508 source that works that i can test

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508/525 HD client
item.dc:creator: @Motoguyx378 Motoguyx378
item.description:
@Motoguyx378 wrote:

Hmm… Are the ports on Both the client and the server the same?
Oh… and btw if your using a 508 server you need a 508 client. And if your using 525 server you need 525 client because it does not connect if it is not compatible.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508/525 HD client
item.dc:creator: @jake434 jake434
item.description:
@jake434 wrote:

Ive done this and still get the error it works perfectly fine on my friends windows xp computer but my vista computer won’t work with it nor will my friends other vista computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508/525 HD client
item.dc:creator: @Kyle_Dibiase Kyle_Dibiase
item.description:
@Kyle_Dibiase wrote:

make sure your server is on, and try doing 127.0.0.1, or leave the server bar blank

Read full topic
